The change in equity [net assets] of a business enterprise during a period from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources which are attributable to the economic entity, including both controlling (parent), noncontrolling interests, and purchased noncontrolling interests. It includes all changes in equity during a period except those resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners, including any and all transactions which are directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent.
The value of the common shares withheld from employee exercises or the vesting of share-based payment arrangements to satisfy the minimum amount of income tax withholding requirements.
Amount of decrease in noncontrolling interest from the sale of the Parent's portion of noncontrolling interest.

Net Income Loss Attributable To Noncontrolling Interest

The change in equity [net assets] of a business enterprise during a period from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources which are attributable to the economic entity, including both controlling (parent), noncontrolling interests, and purchased noncontrolling interests. It includes all changes in equity during a period except those resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners, including any and all transactions which are directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent.
The value of common shares issued during the period due to the exercise of stock options.
The value of the common shares withheld from employee exercises or the vesting of share-based payment arrangements to satisfy the minimum amount of income tax withholding requirements.
Loss related to a notes receivable and related charges following the determination that it was probable that the company would be unable to collect the amounts due from a former customer.
